title: A Fun Setsubun!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Mia-chaaan, Mia-chan, Mia-chan. Are you ready for Setsubun? We’re having a bean throwing contest today nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What? Setsubun? Bean throwing contest?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You see, today is “Setsubun” in Japan. It’s a day where we throw beans at bad ogres to drive them away nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Really!? There are actual ogres in Japan!? Cool!! But are we really going to fight them with beans? Don’t you need a weapon with more firepower? Like.... you know.... Balls?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin would feel bad if we hit them with balls nya. Beans are enough.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Are you sure? Can I use a bat instead?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It has to be beans. We’ll have to eat them according to our age later anyway, so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>They say that if you eat as many beans as your age, you’ll be blessed with good health until next year. Beans are nutritious, after all! Ah, you’re going to eat fewer beans than everyone else nya.... Rin will give you some, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>D-, don’t treat me like a child!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
